channel.title: ml on Ocean Ode
channel.description: Recent content in ml on Ocean Ode

item.title: OMNICODE
item.description: Regex e.g. using sed (stream editor) cat /etc/passwd | sed # dump to sed pattern space (i.e. /pattern/action) p (prints line) d (delete line) s/pattern1/pattern2/ (sub 1 with 2) examples ( ‘4, 10d’ ‘4, +5d’ ‘2, 5!d’ ‘1~3d’) (sed -n ‘1, 3p’) sed 's/old/new/g' (global sub) [-p if subbed, print][-w FILENAME write sub result to file] [-I -i case][M or m empty string] Example: matching phone number (chaining) sed -e 's/^[[:digit:]]\{3\}/(&)/g' -e 's/)[[:digit:]]\{3\}/&-/g' phone.
